content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed-upon price was 1350 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I am not in a position to rate my satisfaction with the outcome. I am here to provide the facts as Peter Schmidt, the landlord.
name: Peter Schmidt
